record.field: The fixed value "%(value)s" in "%(name)s" is invalid according to its type.
The field type in "%(name)s" is not valid for fixed values.
In "%(name)s" fixed value use 0 for False, and any other integer for True.
The date fixed value in "%(name)s" is not valid. Check locale format and configure the template language.
The fixed value in "%(name)s" should be the id of a valid resource of the model picked in 'Related model'. You can get the 'id' browsing the model and right clicking on the resource.
The resource set as fixed value in "%(name)s" is not valid or it does not exist.
No field was defined for the Notebook line in the device interface.
